snippet.title: Near-Mage: Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
✨ Study magick in Transylvania! A narrative-heavy adventure game with a bit of role-playing DNA. Craft your own spells, carve out your own destiny! A game made in Transylvania.
Support us on Kickstarter 👉 https://www.near-mage.com/ks
Wishlist Near-Mage on Steam 👉 https://www.near-mage.com/steam
Info & press pack 👉 https://www.near-mage.com/
